## PHQ-9 vs SWAN

PHQ-9 vs SWAN Psychologists and researchers often confront the challenge of comparing different assessment tools. One common comparison might be between the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ-9) and the Strengths and Weaknesses of ADHD Symptoms and Normal Behaviour scale (SWAN). Both measure different aspects of mental health, with the PHQ-9 focusing more on depressive symptoms while SWAN assesses ADHD symptoms. However, for comprehensive research and analysis, the need often arises to harmonise the questionnaires or make comparisons. This is where the PHQ-9 vs SWAN comparison becomes relevant. Harmony is a remarkable tool that can facilitate this process of harmonisation. Using advanced AI and language processing models, Harmony can successfully compare different items from these two scales. For example, the item "Having little interest or pleasure in doing things" from PHQ-9 can be compared with "I engage in tasks that require sustained mental effort" of SWAN. Viewing these two items from a comparative perspective can reveal insightful information about a patient's mental state. PHQ-9 vs SWAN comparison thus helps garner variables from both scales to give a more nuanced understanding of a patient's mental health. Harmony is equipped to execute the PHQ-9 vs SWAN comparison not just in English, but in multiple languages. Harmony's user-friendly interface lets you upload your own instruments and additionally select from its database. This makes the often time-consuming and laborious task of comparing questionnaires like PHQ-9 vs SWAN seamless. Therefore, Harmony proves to be an indispensable tool for psychologists and researchers alike for their research and assessment tasks.

## Compare the items in PHQ-9 and SWAN

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import PHQ-9 and SWAN into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just PHQ-9 into Harmony</a> - compare PHQ-9 with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just SWAN into Harmony</a> - compare SWAN with other instruments
